message.name: INF_CLOSECASE_CASEAPPEALOPEN
message.locale: Case appeal with ID %1s is open

message.name: INF_CLOSECASE_CASELIABILITY_UNDERPAYMENT_REASON
message.locale: Liability case %1s for %2s could not be closed because there is an underpayment for this case

message.name: INF_CLOSECASE_CASELIABILITY_UNDERPAYMENT_SUBJECT
message.locale: Case %1s of type %2s for %3s could not be closed

message.name: INF_CLOSECASE_CLOSED_REASON
message.locale: Case %1s of type %2s for %3s has been closed by %4s.

message.name: INF_CLOSECASE_CLOSED_SUBJECT
message.locale: Case %1s of type %2s for %3s has been closed by %4s.

message.name: INF_CLOSECASE_CLOSED_DATE
message.locale: Case %1s of type %2s for %3s has been closed with a closure date of %4s.

message.name: INF_CLOSECASE_PENDINGCLOSURE_REASON
message.locale: Case %1s of type %2s for %3s has been set to pending closure on %4s by %5s.

message.name: INF_CLOSECASE_PENDINGCLOSURE_REVIEWER_REASON
message.locale: Outstanding review for case %1s of type %2s for %3s will be canceled on %4d
Outstanding review for case %1s of type %2s for %3s will be cancelled on %4d

message.name: INF_CLOSECASE_PENDINGCLOSURE_REVIEWER_SUBJECT
message.locale: Outstanding review for case %1s of type %2s for %3s will be canceled
Outstanding review for case %1s of type %2s for %3s will be cancelled

message.name: INF_CLOSECASE_PENDINGCLOSURE_SUBJECT
message.locale: Case %1s of type %2s for %3s has been set to pending closure on %4s by %5s.

message.name: INF_CLOSECASE_REVIEWCANCELED_REASON
message.locale: Reviews for case %1s of type %2s for %3s after %4d, are now canceled as the case is now pending closure on that date
Reviews for case %1s of type %2s for %3s after %4d, are now cancelled as the case is now pending closure on that date

message.name: INF_CLOSECASE_REVIEWCANCELED_SUBJECT
message.locale: Assigned reviews for case %1s of type %2s for %3s have been canceled
Assigned reviews for case %1s of type %2s for %3s have been cancelled

message.name: ERR_CLOSECASE_OVERUNDERPAYMENT
message.locale: Case cannot be closed as an over or underpayment exists

message.name: ERR_CLOSECASE_FV_CLOSUREDATE_LARGE
message.locale: Closure date cannot be after today's date

message.name: ERR_CLOSECASE_FV_CLOSUREDATE_STARTDATE
message.locale: Closure date must not be earlier than case start date of %1d.

message.name: INF_CLOSECASE_ACTIVE_TASKS
message.locale: There are active tasks on this case.

message.name: ERR_CLOSECASE_ACTIVE_TASKS
message.locale: This case cannot be closed until all tasks are completed.

message.name: ERR_CLOSECASE_ACTIVE_TASK_DETAILS
message.locale: Task %1s is still active.
